title: President Donald J. Trump’s Healthcare Agenda Puts Seniors and American Patients First – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
October 3, 2019
We will not rest until Americans have the healthcare system they need and deserve, a system that finally puts American patients first.
						President Donald J. Trump					PUTTING AMERICAN PATIENTS FIRST: Since the beginning of his Administration, President Trump has put patients first so every American has the highest quality of healthcare in the world.PUTTING AMERICAN SENIORS FIRST: President Trump is taking action to protect and improve the Medicare system for America’s seniors.PROTECTING VULNERABLE AMERICANS: President Trump is committed to protecting vulnerable American patients and families.   PROVIDING AFFORDABLE OPTIONS: By lowering costs, President Trump is making sure every American can afford high quality healthcare.PUTTING PATIENTS IN CONTROL: President Trump is making sure patients control their own healthcare by empowering them to make informed decisions and giving them more choices.ENSURING HIGH QUALITY CARE: President Trump is working to promote innovative solutions and expand treatment options for Americans living with disease.
